channel.title: Compiler Error Alert System
channel.description:
AlertHandler.java:34: error: cannot find symbol c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), aler t.getY()+alert.extraY, alert.getOpacity()); ^ symbol: method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: variable alertBack of type Sprite AlertHandler.java:44: error: cannot find symbol c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), aler t.getY()+alert.extraY, alert.getOpacity()); ^ symbol: method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: variable alertBack of type Sprite AlertHandler.java:49: error: cannot find symbol c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX (), alert.getY(), hovered ? alert.getOpacity()+25 : alert.getOpacity()); ^ symbol: method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: variable alertBack of type Sprite AlertHandler.java:56: error: aTextDrawingArea_1271 has private access in client c.aTextDrawingArea_1271.drawText(0, alert.getTit le(), alert.getY()+16, alert.getX()+243); ^ AlertHandler.java:57: error: aTextDrawingArea_1271 has private access in client c.aTextDrawingArea_1271.drawText(alert.getTitleC olor(), alert.getTitle(), alert.getY()+15, alert.getX()+242); ^ client.java:13506: error: s is already defined in parsePacket() String s = inStream.readString(); ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 6 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
if anyone could please help :P

try adding these to client.java

public AlertHandler alertHandler; public Sprite alertBack; public Sprite alertBorder; public Sprite alertBorderH;[/quote]
yeh adding alert system, iv already added them :P, this is bugging me now
i now only get these errors

AlertHandler.java:34: error: cannot find symbol c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), aler t.getY()+alert.extraY, alert.getOpacity()); ^ symbol: method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: variable alertBack of type Sprite AlertHandler.java:44: error: cannot find symbol c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX(), aler t.getY()+alert.extraY, alert.getOpacity()); ^ symbol: method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: variable alertBack of type Sprite AlertHandler.java:49: error: cannot find symbol c.alertBack.drawSpriteOpacity(alert.getX (), alert.getY(), hovered ? alert.getOpacity()+25 : alert.getOpacity()); ^ symbol: method drawSpriteOpacity(int,int,int) location: variable alertBack of type Sprite Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. item.title: Compiler Error Alert System

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I am assuming you are adding the “alert system”

try adding these to client.java

public AlertHandler alertHandler; public Sprite alertBack; public Sprite alertBorder; public Sprite alertBorderH;

item.title: Compiler Error Alert System
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:423851”]add this into sprites.java

public void drawSpriteOpacity(int i, int j, int k) { i += anInt1442; j += anInt1443; int i1 = i + j * DrawingArea.width; int j1 = 0; int k1 = myHeight; int l1 = myWidth; int i2 = DrawingArea.width - l1; int j2 = 0; if(j < DrawingArea.topY) { int k2 = DrawingArea.topY - j; k1 -= k2; j = DrawingArea.topY; j1 += k2 * l1; i1 += k2 * DrawingArea.width; } if(j + k1 > DrawingArea.bottomY) k1 -= (j + k1) - DrawingArea.bottomY; if(i < DrawingArea.topX) { int l2 = DrawingArea.topX - i; l1 -= l2; i = DrawingArea.topX; j1 += l2; i1 += l2; j2 += l2; i2 += l2; } if(i + l1 > DrawingArea.bottomX) { int i3 = (i + l1) - DrawingArea.bottomX; l1 -= i3; j2 += i3; i2 += i3; } if(!(l1 <= 0 || k1 <= 0)) { method351(j1, l1, DrawingArea.pixels, myPixels, j2, k1, i2, k, i1); } }[/quote]
thats gave e 91 errors?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error Alert System
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

add this into sprites.java

public void drawSpriteOpacity(int i, int j, int k) { i += anInt1442; j += anInt1443; int i1 = i + j * DrawingArea.width; int j1 = 0; int k1 = myHeight; int l1 = myWidth; int i2 = DrawingArea.width - l1; int j2 = 0; if(j < DrawingArea.topY) { int k2 = DrawingArea.topY - j; k1 -= k2; j = DrawingArea.topY; j1 += k2 * l1; i1 += k2 * DrawingArea.width; } if(j + k1 > DrawingArea.bottomY) k1 -= (j + k1) - DrawingArea.bottomY; if(i < DrawingArea.topX) { int l2 = DrawingArea.topX - i; l1 -= l2; i = DrawingArea.topX; j1 += l2; i1 += l2; j2 += l2; i2 += l2; } if(i + l1 > DrawingArea.bottomX) { int i3 = (i + l1) - DrawingArea.bottomX; l1 -= i3; j2 += i3; i2 += i3; } if(!(l1 <= 0 || k1 <= 0)) { method351(j1, l1, DrawingArea.pixels, myPixels, j2, k1, i2, k, i1); } }

Read full topic
